Condition_summary_1: authorization under Fisheries Act for work likely to cause serious harm to fish, requiring compliance with conditions including habitat offsetting, monitoring, and reporting
Condition_summary_2: prohibition on depositing deleterious substances in water frequented by fish
Condition_summary_3: requirement to obtain access permissions for lands/waters not owned by proponent
Condition_summary_4: no transfer of authorization without prior notification to DFO
Habitat_Type: stream, channel, riparian zone, instream habitat features
Offset_footprint_size: reach sn01, reach sn02, unnamed tributary of seneca creek (specific sizes not quantified in m2)
Vegetation_Cover: 80% survival target for planted vegetation in riparian zone
Instream_structures: constructed instream habitat features including channel morphological features, spawning surveys required
